name: Prettynumbers
tagline: A Java library that formats numbers to abbreviated form. E.g format the file size 50.000 as 50 Kb
body:
### Download with Maven

Add the following repository definition to your pom.xml in repositories section.
``
<repositories>
    <repository>
        <id>laukvik-releases</id>
        <url>https://github.com/laukvik/laukvik-mvn-repo/raw/master/releases</url>
    </repository>      
</repositories>
``
And add the dependency configuration as:
``
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.laukvik</groupId>
    <artifactId>prettynumbers</artifactId>
    <version>1.0</version>
</dependency>
``
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
